name: Off-White
type: The Seven Warlords of the Sea/Donquixote Pirates
effect: [Counter] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +4000 power during this battle. Then, look at 3 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Donquixote Pirates} type Character card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
